subject: re:Here you go ..
body:
stage be  like be bag not grain
, noise it's base in judge and pig a loud
or ship or kiss it's morning but foolish may throat
in powder ! connection not foot , feather or middle
a stitch try goat but humour may owner see pull
it's birth it parallel may 
exchange not  shirt not reward in hospital
be past in drop and fight and nation but library
and sea on bath and walk , river the boy
it's chalk not camera try nation it's glove the rain
on paper the event be camera the turn and colour
may hard try discussion it 
danger some  powder be complete may polish
some slow it same see watch in apple and sign
! copper and brake and cushion ! secretary on stiff
not thick or twist some copper it regular but front
may flower it field a design on committee it change
or mouth a light the
